title: Great way to see Athens and Piraeus
text: It was great over looking the scenery from the top level, the kids loved it and so did we, it great being able to hop and and off as much as you like and there have a constant shcedual. Highly recommend.
place: City Sightseeing Athens & Beach Riviera Hop-On Hop-Off Bus Tour

title: Simply Amazing
text:
Breath taking,to be in the presences of such magnificent hystory, it was worth the walk up to see. You can see all of Athens from up there.
Make sure you wear good shoes it can be a little slippery.

title: Beautiful Hystory
text: This was a must see for me, getting the opertunity to visit the Acropolis museum was amazing, they have truly put on a great display with tremendous detail and knowledge. So much history of a great nation. Go see it!
place: Skip the Line: Athens New Acropolis Museum Ticket

title: Go and see for yourself
text: Amazing location, I took my wife there on a friend's recommendation. Looking out and seeing the acropolis is simply stunning! Staff were exceptional, especially Cristos behind the Bar who made our night that much more enjoyable, he went above and beyond. If you have the opertunity to visit Electra Hotel Athens please do yourself a favor and drop in.
